column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The only hiccup I experienced at Bavette's was the server forgetting to put in some of the sides we ordered. So
column2: our entrees and one side came out with a delay of the other sides. However
column5: didn't charge for the late sides
column6: and bought us three desserts. He more than compensated for a minor mistake that was not even a huge deal.
